data.comment: The match is underway in Southampton.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Southampton Southampton drive forward through Che Adams. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 7, Goal! Che Adams gives Southampton a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Theo Walcott to set up the goal.
In the minute 9, Play has been interrupted briefly in Southampton to check on Theo Walcott, who is grimacing with pain.
Southamptonâ€™s Theo Walcott is on his feet again at St. Mary's Stadium.
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 12, Southampton's Kyle Walker-Peters gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Southampton's Che Adams is on target but unsuccessful.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Theo Walcott of Southampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Peter Bankes signals a Newcastle throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in Southampton.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 19, Newcastle have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Peter Bankes signals a throw-in for Newcastle, close to Southampton's area.
In the minute 22, Sean Longstaff (Newcastle) strikes at St. Mary's Stadium but his header is cleared.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Southampton's Che Adams has run offside.
In the minute 25, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 27, In Southampton, Moussa Djenepo of Southampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Southampton drive upfield and Che Adams gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 27, Oriol Romeu (Southampton) has received a yellow card from Peter Bankes.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Newcastle needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Che Adams for Southampton is whistled offside.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Southampton in the half of Newcastle.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St. Mary's Stadium.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
In the minute 42, Southampton's Theo Walcott misses with an attempt on goal.
Peter Bankes awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Southampton in the half of Newcastle.
Federico Fernandez is booked for the away team.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 45, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Southampton.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at St. Mary's Stadium.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 47, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
Theo Walcott (Southampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 50, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Oriol Romeu (Southampton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 50, Jan Bednarek (Southampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Oriol Romeu of Southampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 52, Newcastle have a goal kick.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Stuart Armstrong of Southampton is pulled up for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 60, Southampton to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Steve Bruce (Newcastle) is making a first substitution, with Matthew Longstaff replacing Jeff Hendrick.
In the minute 63, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Southampton push forward at St. Mary's Stadium and Jan Bednarek gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Newcastle defence.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Newcastle at St. Mary's Stadium.
Peter Bankes awards Southampton a goal kick.
Free kick Newcastle.
In the minute 70, Newcastle push forward at St. Mary's Stadium and Jacob Murphy gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Southampton defence.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Southampton.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The home team replace Moussa Djenepo with Nathan Redmond.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
The match at St. Mary's Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Theo Walcott, who is down injured.
In the minute 77, Theo Walcott for Southampton is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
The away team have replaced Callum Wilson with Andy Carroll. This is the second substitution made today by Steve Bruce.
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Joelinton is replacing Jacob Murphy for the away team.
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 81, Peter Bankes awards the away team a throw-in.
Great finish from Stuart Armstrong to give Southampton a 2-0 lead.
Newcastle drive forward but Andy Carroll is judged offside.
In the minute 84, Peter Bankes signals a Newcastle throw-in in Southampton's half.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Joelinton (Newcastle) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Southampton defenders.
In the minute 86, Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, The home team has substituted Theo Walcott with Shane Long. Ralph Hasenhuttl is thus making his second change.
Throw-in Newcastle.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Sean Longstaff (Newcastle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Newcastle.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Newcastle.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Southampton.
Stuart Armstrong for Southampton drives towards goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
